org.ptolemy.ptango.lib

Class WebServerUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ptolemy.ptango.lib.WebServerUtilities

  • public class WebServerUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A web server and information about the applications registered to it. Used by WebServerManager
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Elizabeth Latronico and Edward A. Lee
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ltrnc)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ltrnc)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) org.eclipse.jetty.server.nio.SelectChannelConnector _selectChannelConnector
      The connector binding a port to the server.
      (package private) static int DEFAULT_MAX_IDLE_TIME
      Use 30 seconds (30000 milliseconds) as the default time the server will wait before returning a timeout response page.
      (package private) static int DEFAULT_PORT_NUMBER
      Use 8078 as the default port number that the server listens to for incoming requests.

        Return true if dynamic port selection is permitted; false otherwise.

      • getMaxIdleTime

        public int getMaxIdleTime()
        Return the maximum amount of time the server will wait before returning a timeout response page.
        Returns:
        The maximum amount of time the server will wait before returning a timeout response page.
        See Also:
        setMaxIdleTime(int)

      • getPortNumber

        public int getPortNumber()
        Return the port number that the server listens to for requests. Note that the port number is only settable in the constructor - there is no setPortNumber() method - since web applications ask for a specific port number and changing the port number will cause client requests to the old port number to fail.
        Returns:
        The port number that the server listens to for requests.

      • isHostingModel

        public boolean isHostingModel(java.lang.String fullModelName)
        Return true if this web server is hosting the given model; false otherwise. The full model name should be provided.
        Parameters:
        fullModelName - The full name of the model to search for
        Returns:
        true if the web server is hosting the given model; false otherwise

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Return true if the web server is running; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the web server is running; false otherwise

      • register

        public void register(WebApplicationInfo appInfo)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Register the following application on this server. Start the server if it has not already been started. Throw an exception if the new application conflicts with existing applications, for example, by requesting the same URL mapping.
        Parameters:
        appInfo - The application to add to this server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the new application conflicts with existing applications, for example, by requesting the same URL mapping.

      • setDynamicPortSelection

        public void setDynamicPortSelection(boolean dynamicPortSelection)
        Set a flag indicating if dynamic port selection is permitted.
        Parameters:
        dynamicPortSelection - True if dynamic port selection is permitted; false otherwise
        See Also:
        getDynamicPortSelection()

      • setMaxIdleTime

        public void setMaxIdleTime(int maxIdleTime)
        Set the maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, that the server will wait before returning a timeout response page.
        Parameters:
        maxIdleTime - The maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, that the server will wait before returning a timeout response page
        See Also:
        getMaxIdleTime()

      • unregister

        public void unregister(WebApplicationInfo appInfo)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Unregister the given application from this server. If this leaves no applications on the server, stop the server.
        Parameters:
        appInfo - The application to remove from the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the application is not registered with this server or if the server cannot be stopped when the last application is unregistered

      • _createServletHandler

        protected void _createServletHandler(WebApplicationInfo appInfo)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a ContextHandler to store all of the servlets defined in the given application (e.g. a Ptolemy model). This includes servlets for both standard HTTP requests and WebSockets. Add this handler to the collection of handlers for this web server.
        Parameters:
        appInfo - Information about the web application.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the servlet cannot be started on the server

      • _createResourceHandlers

        protected void _createResourceHandlers(WebApplicationInfo appInfo)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Create or re-use resource handler(s) to serve files such as images, audio, etc. If the application requests a handler for a path that is already used by an existing resource handler, then the existing handler will be re-used, and the new search locations will be added to its search list. If a new path is provided, a new resource handler will be created, as long as at least one search location is given. New handlers are added to the _handlers list.
        Parameters:
        appInfo - An object containing information needed to register the new application
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If a FileParameter is found that is not a valid URI or references a resource that cannot be found, or if the handler cannot be started on the server
